textAfterTable: 11 Songs Customer Reviews Sunday Morning Suite           by Marnie76 I received so many hours of listening joy in the 70's when I originally purchased this album and will treasure these even more today because, frankly, I am more seasoned. Frank Mills has a very special way of interpreting classic favorites....I have been away from this genre for many years and well, it feels like I'm home again... Biography Born: June 27, 1942 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada Genre: Pop Years Active: '70s, '80s, '90s, '00s Canadian-born composer/pianist Frank Mills scored a minor U.S. hit in 1972 with "Love Me, Love Me Love." It wasn't until the release of "Music Box Dancer" and its subsequent success in 1979, that MIlls became more of a household name. Success was to be short-lived...
